data.title: How to Buy Rio Tinto Stock: Invest in RIO Shares Today (Aug 17, 2024)
data.text:
Rio Tinto is a mining company located in Australia, which is part of the Basic Materials sector, and is traded under the ticker RIO on the NYSE exchange.

Rio Tinto stock last closed at $61.28 , down 2.34% from the previous day, and has increased 5% in one year. It has overperformed other stocks in the Other Industrial Metals & Mining industry by 0.28 percentage points. Rio Tinto stock is currently +4.06% from its 52-week low of $58.89, and -18.39% from its 52-week high of $75.09.

As of Aug 16, 2024, there are 1.63B RIO shares outstanding. The market value of RIO is $99.71B . In the last 24 hours, 2.81M RIO shares were traded.
